name: Unlinkme
tagline: unlinkme, heap double free challenge chain
body:
### Heap Double Free :: Unlinkme
* In this lab, students can get first-hand experience on exploiting heap-based double free vulnerability.
* By playing with the stepwise challenges, students can understand how the heap is managed by `glibc malloc()` and learn to exploit the `unlink()` after figuring out `double free` vulnerabilities.


***
* To use this challenge sequence, please make sure you have set up the server [framework](https://github.com/nsslab-yin/SRCTF), then follow the instructions to import the challenge contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
